title: Introduction
description:
Returned Studios offers multiple roles to its community members as an appreciation.

All of these roles give the member certain perks in the community discord to make obtaining them more worthwhile.

Once you have met the requirement for one of the roles, reach out to us through a support ticket for further instructions on how to receive it.

**Want to know more?**
Select a role from the select menu below and a message seen only by you will display information about the selected role.
